meanings.definition: A person or thing that protects or defends.
meanings.sent1: The brave protectors shielded the village from harm.
meanings.sent2: The security guards are the protectors of the museum.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy dog sees itself as the protector of the house.
meanings.sent4: The ancient castle stood as a silent protector of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The shining knight was known as the protector of the realm.

meanings.definition: A device or substance that prevents damage or injury.
meanings.sent1: The sunscreen lotion acted as a protector against the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: Wearing a helmet is important as a protector during bike rides.
meanings.sent3: The magical amulet was believed to be a powerful protector.
meanings.sent4: The sturdy lock on the door served as a reliable protector of the house.
meanings.sent5: The umbrella was a trusty protector from the rain.

meanings.definition: A person or group appointed to protect or oversee something.
meanings.sent1: The security team was the official protectors of the event.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguards are the protectors of swimmers at the pool.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl was jokingly appointed as the protector of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The committee acted as the protectors of the park's wildlife.
meanings.sent5: The superhero squad was the ultimate protectors of the city.
